title: #128: Boozer (@BertKreischer, @JoeRogan, @AriShaffir, @RickyLundell)
itunes:title: Boozer with Joe Rogan, Bert Kreischer, Ricky Lundell
description: Bert Kreischer met me on the patio of the Comedy Store to talk about his history with alcohol. We covered how he got started, when it became a major part of his life, and where he stand with it now. It was a fun talk that got a little dark in a couple places when we discussed his ex and again when another comedian walked by. And Joe Rogan makes an appearance on the intro.
content:encoded: Bert Kreischer met me on the patio of the Comedy Store to talk about his history with alcohol. It was a fun talk that got a little dark in a couple places when we discussed his ex and again when another comedian walked by. And Joe Rogan makes an appearance on the intro.
